pageTitle: Rory Beca Roy Keyhole Tunic | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 27in / 68.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Hand wash or dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk crepe. A simple, elegant silk blouse from Rory Beca blends a timeless silhouette with subtly sexy accents. A slim hook-and-eye keyhole splits the crew neckline, allowing a peek of skin, while the shirttail hem lends a flattering curved line. Delicate pleats add a light lift to the shoulders, and the long sleeves end in buttoned cuffs. Description Tops > Clothing > Rory Beca > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by her worldly travels, designer Rory Edelman's fashion career began when Friends stylist Deb McGuire bought her hand-knit scarves to be used on the show. Rory's knit creations soon became an L.A. phenomenon, and she went on to launch her first collection under the name Rory Beca in summer 2006. Rory Beca features vintage-inspired, wearable fashions with a feminine edge for styles that are timelessly chic.
